organization_details.summary: The GU IEEE IAS Student Branch Chapter, established on October 23rd, 2024, at Galgotias University, serves as the official student chapter for the IEEE Industry Applications Society. Its mission is to provide students with a platform to explore industrial applications of engineering, develop leadership and technical skills, and foster industry-academia collaboration through events, visits, and challenges, ultimately aiming to transform students into industry innovators.
organization_details.raw_content:
Established on 23rd October 2024, the GU IEEE IAS Student Branch Chapter operates under the umbrella of the IEEE Student Branch at Galgotias University. As the official technical society affiliated with the global IEEE Industry Applications Society (IAS), our chapter provides a dynamic platform for students to delve into real-world industrial applications of engineering and technology. We are dedicated to nurturing student leadership, enhancing industry-relevant technical skills, and promoting global collaboration through impactful initiatives such as technical events, industrial visits, and innovation challenges. With a vision to bridge the gap between academia and industry, we strive to empower students to become future-ready professionals, equipped with the expertise and experience required to excel in industrial settings.
“Transforming students into industry innovators.”
